name: Chomp (Badsheep)
description:
CHOMP is a revisited arcade game, inspired by the popular PACMAN.

Features

  • 40 levels in form of maze.
  • 5 World having their own graphic universe.
  • Progressive AI.
  • More fun with the two players mode.
  • Save scores online, with leaderboard access.
  • Full HD graphic with lot of video FX and particles.
  • Various input : gamepad, keyboard.
  • Many bonuses and power up.
  • Easy to use for beginners.
  • System of challenge / combo / scoring allowing the maddest combinations.
